description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Choose from eight different teams with their own strengths and weaknesses.  Challenge the computer or a friend.  Earn "Victory Points" to build the ultimate fighter!
